name: Trandum
description:
Take control of Fia, a treasure hunter who's heard of an old abandoned factory in the skies, and help her discover the secrets hidden inside, help her discover the secrets hidden inside.

This is a short experience about 10-20 min, you have the base game but also there are a total of 6 golden coins hidden in the factory.

Controls:

With Fia:

  • WASD / Left Joystick -> Move Fia
  • Space / A Button -> Jump Fia
  • Shift / X Button -> Dash Fia
  • E / B Button -> Interact
  • F / Y Button -> Command Titan to follow Fia or Stop it
  • Hold F / Y Button -> Command Titan to go to a location

Driving Titan:

  • WASD / Left Joystick -> Move Titan
  • Left Click / RT Trigger -> Shoot with Titan
  • Hold Right Click / LT Trigger -> Aim with Titan

All the assets (Textures, Models, Materials, Coding, Music, Sounds...) save for some sounds  from freesound.org and the free BlockoutTools pluging for UnrealEngine (https://dmkarpukhin.com/blockout-tools-plugin/), have been created specially for this project by me.

Made for the MechJam in 15 days
